uml2rca.adaptation.association

Class AbstractNaryAssociationAdaptation<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.transformation.AbstractTransformation<S,T>
      • core.adaptation.AbstractAdaptation<org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association,T>
        • uml2rca.adaptation.association.AbstractNaryAssociationAdaptation<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAdaptation<org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association,T>, ITransformation<org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association,T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NaryAssociationMaterializationAdaptation, NaryAssociationToBinaryAssociationsAdaptation

    public abstract class AbstractNaryAssociationAdaptation<T>
extends AbstractAdaptation<org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association,T>
    an NaryAssociationAdaptation generic abstract class that is used to factor common state for all concrete UML n-ary association adaptation classes.

    It must be specialized by all concrete UML n-ary association adaptation classes.
    Author:
    Bachar Rima
    See Also:
    AbstractAdaptation, Association

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractNaryAssociationAdaptation()
      Creates an empty n-ary association adaptation
      AbstractNaryAssociationAdaptation(org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association source)
      Creates an n-ary association adaptation having source as its source n-ary association to adapt, then applies the adaptation to obtain the target entity, and cleans the post-adaptation residues.

    • Field Detail

      • associations

        protected java.util.List<org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association> associations
        The list of associations generated by this adaptation. Its semantics are defined by the concrete n-ary adaptation class specializing this class (e.g. for an NaryAssociationMaterializationAdaptation, this attribute will refer to the associations connecting the materialized target class, replacing the n-ary association to adapt, to the original members of the n-ary association to adapt, whereas for an NaryAssociationToBinaryAssociationsAdaptation, this attribute will refer to the target binary associations replacing the n-ary association to adapt)

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractNaryAssociationAdaptation

        public AbstractNaryAssociationAdaptation()
        Creates an empty n-ary association adaptation

      • AbstractNaryAssociationAdaptation

        public AbstractNaryAssociationAdaptation(org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association source)
                                  throws NotAnNaryAssociationException
        Creates an n-ary association adaptation having source as its source n-ary association to adapt, then applies the adaptation to obtain the target entity, and cleans the post-adaptation residues.
        Parameters:
        source - the source n-ary association to adapt
        Throws:
        NotAnNaryAssociationException - if the provided source entity is not an n-ary association
